data.application.links:
- url: https://secure.sysdig.com/#/vulnerabilities/runtime/?filter=kubernetes.namespace.name={{.spec.destination.namespace}}
  title: Sysdig Vulnerability Management - Application Report
data.resource.links:
# Sysdig Secure Pod Report
- url: https://secure.sysdig.com/#/vulnerabilities/runtime/?filter=kubernetes.namespace.name={{.metadata.namespace}}+and+kubernetes.workload.type=pod+and+kubernetes.workload.name={{.metadata.name}}
  title: Sysdig Vulnerability Management - Pod Report
  if: kind == "Pod"
# Sysdig Secure Deployment Report
- url: https://secure.sysdig.com/#/vulnerabilities/runtime/?filter=kubernetes.namespace.name={{.metadata.namespace}}+and+kubernetes.workload.type=deployment+and+kubernetes.workload.name={{.metadata.name}}
  title: Sysdig Vulnerability Management - Deployment Report
  if: kind == "Deployment"
# Sysdig Secure Daemonset Report
- url: https://secure.sysdig.com/#/vulnerabilities/runtime/?filter=kubernetes.namespace.name={{.metadata.namespace}}+and+kubernetes.workload.type=daemonset+and+kubernetes.workload.name={{.metadata.name}}
  title: Sysdig Vulnerability Management - Daemonset Report
  if: kind == "Daemonset"
# Sysdig Secure Node Report
- url: https://secure.sysdig.com/#/vulnerabilities/runtime/?filter=kubernetes.node.name={{.spec.nodeName}}
  title: Sysdig Vulnerability Management - Node Report
  if: kind == "Pod" || kind == "Deployment" || kind == "Daemonset"
